titleStmt.title: The garlande of godly flowers bewtifully adorned as most freshly they flourish in the gardeins of right faithfull Christian writers. Yéeldyng foorth a very comfortable sauour to the afflicted soule, wherby hée is salfly [sic] transported vnto the mercifull throne of the most glorious God. Carefully collected, and diligently digested into ordre, by Tho. Twyne, Gentleman. 1574.
titleStmt.author: Twyne, Thomas, 1543-1613.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
